summary: A galactic hunter chases down his deadliest prey in the universe.
cast: William Katt|Dedee Pfeiffer|Wittly Jourdan|Randy Mulkey|Jennifer Couch|Jason S. Gray|John Murphy Jr.|Kevin Kazakoff|Philip Bak|Josh Tessier|Matthew Bolton|Collin Brock|Darbi Gwynn|Aaron Council|Rob Filson
title: AVH: Alien vs. Hunter
